ask_name: May I have your name, please?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you search for restaurants.
restaurant_ask_restaurant: What restaurant would you like to go to?
restaurant_ask_location: In what part of town should the restaurant be located?
restaurant_ask_food_type: What cuisine are you looking for?
restaurant_ask_rating: Any minimum rating that the restaurant should have?
restaurant_ask_delivery: Are you looking for a restaurant that offers a delivery service?
restaurant_ask_takes_reservations: Are you looking for restaurants that offer a reservation service?
restaurant_inform_search_results:
Great, I found the {restaurant_name:s}, located {location:s}. It serves {food_type:s},
has an average rating of {rating:d} and is in the {cost:s} price range
restaurant_ask_continue_searching: Would you like to search for any more restaurants?
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
